description: Set the foreground color used for painting and filling.

userMessage.error: Unable to set foreground color. Invalid color values provided.

params.paramDescription: Red component (0-255). Default is 0.
Green component (0-255). Default is 0.
Blue component (0-255). Default is 0.
Hex color code (e.g., '#FF5733' or 'FF5733'). Overrides RGB values if provided.

description: Set the background color used for erasing and canvas operations.

userMessage.error: Unable to set background color. Invalid color values provided.

params.paramDescription: Red component (0-255). Default is 255.
Green component (0-255). Default is 255.
Blue component (0-255). Default is 255.
Hex color code (e.g., '#FFFFFF' or 'FFFFFF'). Overrides RGB values if provided.

description: Swap the foreground and background colors.

userMessage.error: Unable to swap colors.

description: Reset foreground to black and background to white.

userMessage.success: Colors reset to default (black foreground, white background).
userMessage.error: Unable to reset colors.

description: Open the color picker dialog to choose a color.

userMessage.success: Color picker dialog is open. Select a color and click OK.
userMessage.error: Unable to open color picker.

params.paramDescription: Which color to set. Possible values: FOREGROUND, BACKGROUND. Default is FOREGROUND.

description: Sample a color from the image using the eyedropper tool.

userMessage.error: Unable to sample color. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Horizontal position as percentage (0-100). Default is 50.
Vertical position as percentage (0-100). Default is 50.
Sample size. Possible values: POINT, 3X3_AVERAGE, 5X5_AVERAGE, 11X11_AVERAGE, 31X31_AVERAGE, 51X51_AVERAGE, 101X101_AVERAGE. Default is POINT.
Set sampled color as. Possible values: FOREGROUND, BACKGROUND. Default is FOREGROUND.

description: Fill the selection or layer with the specified color.

userMessage.error: Unable to fill. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: What to fill with. Possible values: FOREGROUND, BACKGROUND, COLOR, CONTENT_AWARE, PATTERN. Default is FOREGROUND.
Red component if fillType is COLOR (0-255).
Green component if fillType is COLOR (0-255).
Blue component if fillType is COLOR (0-255).
Fill opacity from 0 to 100 percent. Default is 100.
Blending mode. Possible values: NORMAL, MULTIPLY, SCREEN, OVERLAY, SOFT_LIGHT, HARD_LIGHT, COLOR, LUMINOSITY. Default is NORMAL.
Only fill non-transparent pixels. Default is false.

description: Apply a gradient fill to the selection or layer.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply gradient. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Gradient style. Possible values: LINEAR, RADIAL, ANGLE, REFLECTED, DIAMOND. Default is LINEAR.
Start X position as percentage (0-100). Default is 0.
Start Y position as percentage (0-100). Default is 50.
End X position as percentage (0-100). Default is 100.
End Y position as percentage (0-100). Default is 50.
Type of gradient. Possible values: FOREGROUND_TO_BACKGROUND, FOREGROUND_TO_TRANSPARENT, BLACK_TO_WHITE, CUSTOM. Default is FOREGROUND_TO_BACKGROUND.
Reverse gradient direction. Default is false.
Add dithering to reduce banding. Default is true.
Gradient opacity from 0 to 100 percent. Default is 100.
Blending mode. Possible values: NORMAL, MULTIPLY, SCREEN, OVERLAY. Default is NORMAL.

description: Open the Swatches panel.

userMessage.error: Unable to open Swatches panel.

description: Add the current foreground color to the Swatches panel.

userMessage.error: Unable to add color to swatches.

params.paramDescription: Name for the new swatch. Default is auto-generated based on color values.

description: Load a color swatch library.

userMessage.error: Unable to load swatch library. The file may be invalid or inaccessible.

params.paramDescription: Built-in library to load. Possible values: WEB_SAFE, PASTEL, EARTH_TONES, SKIN_TONES, FOLIAGE, METALS. Default is WEB_SAFE.

description: Convert the document color mode to grayscale.

userMessage.error: Unable to convert to grayscale. Ensure a document is open.

description: Convert the document color mode to RGB.

userMessage.success: Document converted to RGB color mode.
userMessage.error: Unable to convert to RGB. Ensure a document is open.

description: Convert the document color mode to CMYK for print.

userMessage.success: Document converted to CMYK color mode.
userMessage.error: Unable to convert to CMYK. Ensure a document is open.

description: Convert the document color mode to Lab color.

userMessage.success: Document converted to Lab color mode.
userMessage.error: Unable to convert to Lab. Ensure a document is open.

description: Assign a color profile to the document without converting colors.

userMessage.error: Unable to assign color profile. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Color profile to assign. Possible values: SRGB, ADOBE_RGB, PROPHOTO_RGB, DISPLAY_P3, NONE. Default is SRGB.

description: Convert the document to a different color profile.

userMessage.success: Document converted to new color profile.
userMessage.error: Unable to convert color profile. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Target color profile. Possible values: SRGB, ADOBE_RGB, PROPHOTO_RGB, DISPLAY_P3. Default is SRGB.
Rendering intent. Possible values: PERCEPTUAL, SATURATION, RELATIVE_COLORIMETRIC, ABSOLUTE_COLORIMETRIC. Default is RELATIVE_COLORIMETRIC.
Use black point compensation. Default is true.
Use dithering to reduce banding. Default is true.

description: Replace a specific color with another color in the image.

userMessage.error: Unable to replace color. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Red component of color to replace (0-255).
Green component of color to replace (0-255).
Blue component of color to replace (0-255).
Red component of replacement color (0-255).
Green component of replacement color (0-255).
Blue component of replacement color (0-255).
Color tolerance from 0 to 200. Default is 40.

description: Adjust specific color ranges without affecting others.

userMessage.error: Unable to apply selective color adjustment. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Color range to adjust. Possible values: REDS, YELLOWS, GREENS, CYANS, BLUES, MAGENTAS, WHITES, NEUTRALS, BLACKS. Default is REDS.
Cyan adjustment from -100 to 100. Default is 0.
Magenta adjustment from -100 to 100. Default is 0.
Yellow adjustment from -100 to 100. Default is 0.
Black adjustment from -100 to 100. Default is 0.
Adjustment method. Possible values: RELATIVE, ABSOLUTE. Default is RELATIVE.

description: Match colors between images or layers.

userMessage.error: Unable to match colors. Ensure a document is open.

params.paramDescription: Luminance adjustment from 1 to 200. Default is 100.
Color intensity from 1 to 200. Default is 100.
Fade amount from 0 to 100. Default is 0.
Remove color cast. Default is false.
